name: Phantom Inside
description:
Very short 2D side puzzle platformer.

Basic concept was to create puzzle and story based game with passive-aggressive support unit, which is controlled by AI. 

Input

WASD - move

SPACE - jump

F - summon support

Plugins

 (voxel assets made  in MagicaVoxel and animated in blender with IK)

Cinemachine and Timeline, Post Processing Stack v1

VoxelImporter

Bolt

DOTweenPro

Bolt.Addons.Community.Fundamentals
